-- DaoSuppliers_D4_Delete -- 2013/1/10 日立 太郎 DELETE FROM [Suppliers]
WHERE AND [SupplierID] = @SupplierIDAND [SupplierID] IS NULL AND [CompanyName] = @CompanyNameAND [CompanyName] IS NULL AND [ContactName] = @ContactNameAND [ContactName] IS NULL AND [ContactTitle] = @ContactTitleAND [ContactTitle] IS NULL AND [Address] = @AddressAND [Address] IS NULL AND [City] = @CityAND [City] IS NULL AND [Region] = @RegionAND [Region] IS NULL AND [PostalCode] = @PostalCodeAND [PostalCode] IS NULL AND [Country] = @CountryAND [Country] IS NULL AND [Phone] = @PhoneAND [Phone] IS NULL AND [Fax] = @FaxAND [Fax] IS NULL AND [HomePage] = @HomePageAND [HomePage] IS NULL
